name: If I Was Your Girl
description: age everyone who stumbles across this to go read "If I was your girl" by Meredith Russo, its truly an amazing view into the lives of trans people and she really nails pretty much everything. Apart from that Im pretty proud that I made this in a day(senior things).  The ultimate aim being to develop a prototype for eventual development of the novel using YarnSpinner, the tool used for dialogue in Night in the Woods. It was certainly tough getting used to the tool, even more so considering there's no community content to go off of, but in the end it was worth it since its such a powerful tool.
